Articles.Content:
I\'ve been wanting to go to this museum for a long time ever since I heard the Apollo 9 Command Module was there and I finally got the chance to go. I got a few pictures of me with the CM but also some without me. In addition, they had Bill Anders\'s (Apollo 8) flown suit, several lunar samples brought back from the Apollo missions, some stuff worn by Neil Armstrong, someone\'s Gemini suit and a REALLY cool MaxFlight simulator that had full rolling motion and everything. (I flew upside down for more than 30 seconds at a time lol)

Here\'s me with the Apollo 9 CM. It was awesome! Look how charred and crummy it looks from reentering the atmosphere.

Here\'s the CM without me standing in front of it.
